title: Chris Yuhan Liu
text:
Welcome to my homepage!
I am Chris Liu (he/him/his), a second-year statistics & data science student at California Polytechnic State University in beautiful San Luis Obispo.
I am currently a research assistant with Dr. Saba Gerami, where I create and expand upon theoretical frameworks for analysing student understanding in calculus.
Outside of academia, I enjoy reading classic novels, cooking new foods, and being outdoors. I am currently reading Nikolai Gogol’s Dead Souls. Let me know if you have any book recommendations!
Feel free to contact me about anything via email!
